api_list.name: Get all mobile news
api_list.description: this endpoint will return back all mobile  news from 4 sites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tech-moblie-news-and-reviews-from-4-different-sites-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tech-moblie-news-and-reviews-from-4-different-sites-live-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests
